In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the **[spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of light** allows you to learn the **spell of light**.

## Effects

Casting the spell of light has the same effect as an [uncursed](/wiki/Uncursed "Uncursed") [scroll of light](/wiki/Scroll_of_light "Scroll of light"): a circular area with 5 squares radius around your position (while casting) is permanently made lit.

## Strategy

The spell is one of the easiest to learn and cast; being able to use it reliably usually means that scrolls of light can be saved for blanking or [polypiling](/wiki/Polypiling "Polypiling") later on. It is especially useful to train up skill in [divination spells](/wiki/Divination_spells "Divination spells"), and can light your way through the [Gnomish Mines](/wiki/Gnomish_Mines "Gnomish Mines") if you have enough [energy](/wiki/Energy "Energy"). Increasing the amount of lit squares can help you use a [polearm](/wiki/Polearm "Polearm"), [fireball](/wiki/Spellbook_of_fireball "Spellbook of fireball") or [cone of cold](/wiki/Spellbook_of_cone_of_cold "Spellbook of cone of cold"); it can also aid in [jumping](/wiki/Jump "Jump") in dark parts of the dungeon, though it is slightly less powerful since casting light takes up a turn.

Being able to cast light also helps you save lamp [oil](/wiki/Oil "Oil") during protracted battles, especially on the [stairs](/wiki/Stairs "Stairs") up where [covetous](/wiki/Covetous "Covetous") monsters like to retreat. It can also be used to mark areas you have already searched for the [vibrating square](/wiki/Vibrating_square "Vibrating square").
